channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat, Inc. -- Satellite 6
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat, Inc. -- Satellite 6

item.title: CVE-2017-15136|2024-08-05T19:50:16.369Z -- red%20hat%2C%20inc. -- satellite%206
item.description: When registering and activating a new system with Red Hat Satellite 6 if the new systems hostname is then reset to the hostname of a previously registered system the previously registered system will lose access to updates including security updates.
